title: The Final Frontier: The Ovion Archives
description: Irwing keeps the excitement high right from the first chapter to the end, an epic journey with bouts of humour, plenty of action and a good command of character - Bonnie Goodwin "This captivating space age fantasy is filled with adventure, laser blazing action and political drama. Sim grows on you as an intriguing character. The book is littered with several other key characters all portrayed in a first person read making the reader experience firsthand the journey of these characters from a planet called Johua to Earth by putting on different hats of its diverse characters" - Janice Michaels "The Final Frontier is a real page turner. This stunning story- telling is a first novel by H M Irwing for what I hope will be a long career of writing space adventures and intrigues. You've a really talented writer here" - JR Rodgers
author: H.M.  Irwing
